column4: Hello i need some help to install the 7.04 version. When i try to install i get a Buffer I/O Error un device fd0, logical block0 error. Config : Asus P5W DH deluxe
Do you know how can i get ubuntu run ?
can you boot from the live cd at all ?
no i can't boot from the live cd
consider that you might hve a borked cd,  try it in another computer
ok i will try this on a other computer and my ide controller is Jmicron can it be this the error ?
I don't know how your hardware miight interfeer,  start with the basic, bad cd , if so , burn another one
you did download the right cd for your system right ?
i get the amd 64 cd for my C2D E6400
unless you have a good reason to run the 64 bit version go with the i386 one,  there is more support for flash , wine and stuff like that
ok i will download the I386 to try if it work
understand,  that has nothing to do whit the problem you are experiencing right now, check the cd on another comp anyway
ok i will go try it on an other comp and come back here after
